recipesJson.name: Grapefruit lemonade
recipesJson.author: Tvsty1
recipesJson.description:
Cap grapefruit, flv pink guava & vt honey pomelo give us a nice bright tangy grapefruit flavour.

La lemonade is used as our lemonade base with a small amount of fe lemon added to help it stop fading so quickly.

Enjoy üòÅ

reviews.text: This is a fantastic recipe.  It is versatile in that you can sub out the top grapefruit flavor with the rest of the recipe as a base.  Cheers!
